metadata.title: USN-6923-2 -- Linux kernel vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Benedict Schl√ºter, Supraja Sridhara, Andrin Bertschi, and Shweta Shinde discovered that an untrusted hypervisor could inject malicious #VC interrupts and compromise the security guarantees of AMD SEV-SNP. This flaw is known as WeSee. A local attacker in control of the hypervisor could use this to expose sensitive information or possibly execute arbitrary code in the trusted execution environment. (CVE-2024-25742)  Several security issues were discovered in the Linux kernel. An attacker could possibly use these to compromise the system. This update corrects flaws in the following subsystems:   - TTY drivers;   - SMB network file system;   - Netfilter;   - Bluetooth subsystem; (CVE-2024-26886, CVE-2023-52752, CVE-2024-36016, CVE-2024-26952, CVE-2024-27017)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6923-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-buildinfo-5.15.0-1059-ibm - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-buildinfo-5.15.0-1059-raspi - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-headers-5.15.0-1059-ibm - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-headers-5.15.0-1059-raspi - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-ibm-cloud-tools-common - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-ibm-headers-5.15.0-1059 - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-ibm-source-5.15.0 - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-ibm-tools-5.15.0-1059 - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-ibm-tools-common - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-image-5.15.0-1059-ibm - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-image-5.15.0-1059-raspi - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1059-ibm - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-modules-5.15.0-1059-ibm - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-modules-5.15.0-1059-raspi - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-modules-extra-5.15.0-1059-ibm - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-modules-extra-5.15.0-1059-raspi - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-raspi-headers-5.15.0-1059 - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-raspi-tools-5.15.0-1059 - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-tools-5.15.0-1059-ibm - 5.15.0-1059.62 linux-tools-5.15.0-1059-raspi - 5.15.0-1059.62 No subscription required  linux-headers-ibm - 5.15.0.1059.55 linux-ibm - 5.15.0.1059.55 linux-image-ibm - 5.15.0.1059.55 linux-tools-ibm - 5.15.0.1059.55 No subscription required  linux-headers-raspi - 5.15.0.1059.57 linux-headers-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0.1059.57 linux-image-raspi - 5.15.0.1059.57 linux-image-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0.1059.57 linux-modules-extra-raspi - 5.15.0.1059.57 linux-modules-extra-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0.1059.57 linux-raspi - 5.15.0.1059.57 linux-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0.1059.57 linux-tools-raspi - 5.15.0.1059.57 linux-tools-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0.1059.57 No subscription required
